sense.gloss: wholeheartedly, with heart and soul, intently, with undivided attention, with intense concentration, single-mindedly

sdata.j: ↑一心不乱↑↓|いっしんふらん|↓に↑仕事↑↓しごと↓に↑取↑↓と↓り↑組↑↓く↓むのは↑良↑↓よ↓いけれど、まわりが↑全然↑↓ぜんぜん↓↑見↑↓み↓えてないね。
sdata.e: It's good to be able to concentrate single-mindedly on your work, but you're completely ignoring the people around you.

sdata.j: ↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑仕事↑↓しごと↓に↑一心不乱↑↓|いっしんふらん|↓に↑打↑↓う↓ち↑込↑↓こ↓みなさい。
sdata.e: Give yourself to your work with body and soul.
